target.name: Procedure
target.text: On the standalone machine, edit the Installer.xml file (see "The sample-installer.xml File" on page 61):

target.name: Step
target.text: If necessary, edit the default rmi port: lucene.rmi.port="1099"

target.name: Step
target.text: Run the installer on the standalone machine and choose the option for Novell Teaming Enterprise Lucene Server (see "Running the Installer" on page 17).

target.name: Step
target.text: Shut down Novell Teaming on the Novell Teaming server (see "Starting and Stopping Novell Teaming" on page 19).

target.name: Step
target.text: On the standalone machine, check the lucene-server.properties file and find the setting for index.root.dir (you can edit this setting to change the location of the root directory).

target.name: Step
target.text: Create a "liferay.com" subdirectory in the <index.root.dir> directory.

target.name: Step
target.text: On the Novell Teaming server, look at the ssf.properties file and find the data.root.dir setting.

target.name: Step
target.text: Copy all the files from the <data.root.dir>/lucene/liferay.com directory on the Novell Teaming server to the <index.root.dir>/liferay.com directory you just created on the standalone machine.

target.name: Step
target.text: For UNIX systems, make sure permissions are set so that the Novell Teaming user has full access to these files and the liferay.com directory.

target.name: Step
target.text: Start the server at the end of the installation (if it is not already started):

target.text: Run the rmiregistry-startup script in the bin directory

target.name: Step
target.text: Run the indexserver-startup script in the bin directory

target.name: Step
target.text: Restart Novell Teaming (see "Starting and Stopping Novell Teaming" on page 19).
